attributes.action: Make Monday 12th July 2021 a national bank holiday
attributes.additional_details: With the current crisis the country/world has been in the England national football team is given us a great amount of joy/hope and the ability to bring the country back to how it should be.
attributes.background: Reaching a agreement for this coming Monday to be a bank holiday

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
